title: AIKA
description:
Property Description

AIKA WITH HOT TUB & PETFRIENDLY




Do you want to take a break from everyday life for a few days? The AIKA (means â€˜timeâ€™ in Finnish) is the perfect place to take some time for yourself. Imagine that the clock has stopped ticking and take advantage of this experience to find yourself alone, as a couple, with your friends or your family, in an intimate and unique setting.




The AIKA is a 4-person cabin (additional charges will apply for 2 people and more, per night). Perched at an altitude of 535 meters, it has everything to seduce you and allow you to spend a comforting moment, far from the hustle and bustle. All you have to do is relax and soak up on good vibrations surrounded by nature.




This unique place offers a wide range of activities, including mountain biking, hiking, cross-country skiing, fat-biking and snowshoeing with direct access to the trails (mandatory pass of the Sentiers du Moulin).




(CITQ #311053) Exp. 2025-10-18




For each reservation, a tree will be planted to repopulate the beautiful forests of Canada and around the world.

YAK WITH THERMAL BASIN & PETFRIENDLY Welcome to Yak, an oasis of elegance in the heart of Montagne MaelstrÃ¶m, at an altitude of 530 meters, where style meets comfort. The Yak is perfect for family getaways or gatherings with friends. With 2 carefully furnished closed bedrooms (one with a queen bed and the other with a double bed) and a sofa bed, 4 to 6 people can come together while enjoying privacy. At Yak, you wonâ€™t miss waking up every morning to a breathtaking spectacle. The large windows offer a panoramic view of the forest and surrounding mountains, creating an unforgettable backdrop for your stay. In terms of comfort, everything is there! Air conditioning for hot summer days, heated floors, and a gas fireplace to keep you warm during cold winter days. If you enjoy lively meals around a large table, Yakâ€™s dining area comfortably seats 6 people. Enjoy convivial meals and memorable evenings. To prepare your meals, youâ€™ll find all the amenities of your kitchen at Yak: an 11-cubic-foot refrigerator, microwave/convection oven, gas stove, and dishwasher. What will make your stay truly memorable is the outdoor thermal pool with a unique glass window that allows you to contemplate the mountains, even underwater. title: THE LAGÃ–M
description:
Property Description

THE LAGÃ–M" Becoming the symbol of the MaelstrÃ¶m Mountain wasnâ€™t in LagÃ¶mâ€™s plans. Yet, it happened. And it happened because it was designed with the intention of embodying both simplicity and boldness. Unintentionally, LagÃ¶m paved the way for this trend so that today, the MaelstrÃ¶m Mountain stands out with a unique and original offer of rental cabins. Perched between sky and earth, at 550 meters above sea level, The LagÃ¶m stands like a beacon calling for balance. From the road, it seems to turn its back on us. But as soon as we climb the few steps leading to the terrace, we realize that itâ€™s to better face one of the most spectacular views that Mother Nature has created. As we get lost in the raw beauty of the mountains and valleys stretching as far as the eye can see, worries evaporate to make way for a state of contemplation. Then we turn around, and finally, The LagÃ¶m shows us its face. Tall and large windows give us a glimpse of a minimalist design bathed in natural light. Once inside, we feel that the space has been designed to nourish the soul and elevate the spirit. On the ground floor, lush plants adorn the space, while a strategically placed mirror in the kitchenette reflects the outdoor view, creating the illusion of a window. Upstairs, the view leaves us speechless, and the bed, as comfortable as a cloud, makes us want to lie down on our backs. The LagÃ¶mâ€™s little extras: â€¢ Its thermal tub that allows the body to bathe in well-being while the eyes bathe in the beauty of the scenery. â€¢ Its terrace at tree canopy level that gives the impression of being on top of the world. â€¢ Its energy certification: 100% operational on solar energy, The LagÃ¶m is eco energy certified. â€¢ While staying at The LagÃ¶m, make sure to do more than just appreciate the scenery. Dive into it by venturing onto the nearby trails. Whether you prefer leisurely strolls (such as hiking, snowshoeing, or cross-country skiing) or crave excitement (like mountain biking or fat biking), thereâ€™s an adventure waiting that perfectly suits your preferences and level of thrill. description:
Property Description

Escape to our chic jungle retreat! Surrounded by lush nature, it's a serene paradise. Adorned with handcrafted decor, the interior exudes understated elegance and boho charm. Relax in the tranquil jungle with a private plunge pool on the balcony (hot & cold water options). Enjoy convenience with 2 full bathrooms and a spacious double-height design. The space This is a handpicked decorated loft in Tulum, surrounded by nature you may enjoy the 2fl distribution of the unit where you will get plenty of natural sunlight during the day. Guest access The Neighborhood is called Region 15, happens to be the newest area in Tulum being developed. La Veleta is a 5-min drive, city center 10-15min drive, beach 15-20min drive. To get around you could use taxis, but it may be more convenient to have your own transportation method (Car, scooter, or at least a bike). There is free parking both in the building and on the street 24hrs. Other things to note Tulum is one of the fastest growing cities in Mexico, as a result there may be occasional power outages all over the town, youâ€™ll be surrounded mostly by jungle however you may see sites being developed. Natural area with no street illumination at night and unpaved roads there could be potholes during the rainy season. Tulum's Cellular network is not the best, make sure to plan ahead, as internet access could be limited to Wi-Fi networks.

title: Seaside 2BR Penthouse with Pool-C301
description:
Property Description

Welcome to Your Perfect Island Escape! 

 

Nestled in the serene Punta Cocos area, Yum Balam is located in the islandâ€™s most peaceful corner, offering you a tranquil retreat away from the bustle of the tourist crowds. 

 

Enjoy amazing ocean views and breathtaking sunsets from your private rooftop and access a nearly private, turquoise beach just steps away. 

 

Stay connected with ease, as we offer Starlink WiFi up to 50 megas, ensuring that you can enjoy smooth browsing and streaming during your stay. 




The space 




Charming 2 bedroom penthouse with private terrace, pool & ocean views. 

 

Perfect for families, couples, or friends, this stunning penthouse offers an unforgettable vacation experience where you can unwind and reconnect with nature. 

 

The master bedroom features a queen-size bed, while the second bedroom offers twin beds. For additional comfort, there's a sofa bed in the living room that accommodates one adult. Enjoy 2 full bathrooms, a smart TV in the living room, and a washer/dryer for added convenience. The fully equipped kitchen allows you to prepare your favorite meals, making it easy to relax and dine in. Both bedrooms and the living area are fitted with sheer and blackout blinds for your comfort. 

 

Designed for a tranquil retreat, this apartment offers the perfect atmosphere to soak in the serene sounds of nature and watch stunning sunsets. Step outside onto your private terrace and pool area, where you can truly unwind. 

 

Weâ€™re very close from a popular bioluminescence viewing spotâ€”experience the magical phenomenon, especially during the new moon. 

 

Traveling with a larger group? Let us know, and weâ€™ll share details on additional sister apartments in the same building! We can accommodate a group up to 30 people. 

 

*The building does not have an elevator; stairs must be used for access. 




Guest access 




Guests also have access to the shared common areas and the pool. 

 

Pool Hours: 8:00 AM - 10:00 PM 

 

The private pool has no specific hours, but we kindly ask guests to be mindful of noise after 10:00 PM to ensure a peaceful environment for all. 




Other things to note 




*ABOUT HOLBOX: Holbox Island is a true rustic paradise, where nature remains the star. The islandâ€™s sandy streets and unspoiled beaches are carefully preserved to maintain their natural beauty. Unlike other destinations that clear sargassum or restrict beach access, Holbox embraces its wild side, offering open and public shores for all to enjoy. 

The islandâ€™s character shifts with the seasons. During the rainy season, puddles can form along the sandy roads, adding to its laid-back, rustic charm. 

Yum Balamâ€™s secluded location away from the lively town center enhances its peaceful atmosphere, though itâ€™s a good idea to plan your transportation in advance to fully enjoy the tranquility. 

 

*PET-FRIENDLY POLICY: We welcome your pets! Please follow these guidelines to ensure a great stay for everyone: 

- Clean up after your pet and dispose of waste properly. 

- Pets must not be left unattended in the unit or terrace. 

- Ensure pets do not disturb other guests. 

- Owners are responsible for any damages caused by their pets. 

- A pet fee is charged to cover the extra cleaning needed due to the beach environment. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation! 

 

*WELCOME AMENITIES: We provide essential welcome items such as toilet paper, shampoo, dish soap, and drinking water. Once these are used up, guests are kindly asked to restock them. 

 

*QUIET HOURS: To ensure a restful stay, we have quiet hours from 11:00 PM to 8:00 AM. We kindly ask all guests to respect this, as Yum Balam is designed to be a peaceful retreat. 

 

*CONCIERGE SERVICES: Weâ€™re here to help with all your needs, from arranging private airport transfers and pre-arranged grocery shopping to connecting you with tour operators, booking massages, and assisting with golf or bike rentals. 

 

*LONG-TERM RENTALS: Please note that electricity consumption is not included in long-term rentals (over 28 nights). 

 

*PEST CONTROL: While we fumigate monthly, please understand that, being surrounded by nature, mosquitoes, ants, and other insects are common. 

 

*POWER OUTAGES: Power outages can occasionally occur in Holbox, especially due to storms or issues with the local power company. 

 

*CASH RECOMMENDATIONS: We highly recommend traveling with cash, specially for taxis. 

 

*DRINKING WATER: We offer complimentary drinking water for your convenience. Should you need more, 20-liter bottles can be purchased for $100 MXN. 

 

*REVIEWS: We truly value your feedbackâ€”it helps us grow and ensures weâ€™re delivering the best experience possible. If you encounter any concerns during your stay, please let us know so we can address them right away. Our goal is for you to have an amazing 5-star experience, and we want to make sure there are no surprises when it's time to share your review!

Villa Rio




Welcome to Villa Rio, a stunning three-bedroom, three-bathroom beach house located on a serene water canal in the beautiful Riverland neighborhood of Fort Lauderdale. With its prime location and an array of amenities, this vacation rental offers a perfect retreat for those seeking to experience the splendor of Fort Lauderdale.

Take a refreshing dip in the heated pool or engage in a friendly competition at the mini-golf area. The outdoor BBQ area with a lanai and outdoor dining provides the perfect setting for an alfresco meal with your loved ones.




This recently renovated property boasts modern appliances and is fully equipped to meet all your needs. The spacious and tastefully decorated interior has been professionally designed by Soler Decor, creating an atmosphere of luxury and relaxation.




Whether you're looking to unwind or stay productive, Villa Rio has got you covered. Enjoy a leisurely kayak or pedal boat ride along the canal, or take advantage of the private boat dock to embark on your own aquatic adventures.




Located in a quiet neighborhood, Villa Rio offers a peaceful escape, yet it provides easy access to nearby parks, attractions, shopping centers, and pristine beaches. Explore the lively atmosphere and renowned dining options on Las Olas Beach, just a short drive away.




With games, fun activities, and a dedicated work area, this property is an ideal destination for families, friends, and remote workers looking to balance relaxation and productivity. Escape the winter blues and bask in the warm Fort Lauderdale sunshine at Villa Rio.

THE PIC (PETFRIENDLY)




 If your dream is to live long enough to time travel, your dream has now come true! You can now travel back in time at micro-chalet Le Pic. A unique concept on 5 levels that can accommodate 6 people (2 people and more / additional charges will apply per night $). At each level, an era: Retro kitchen from the 1960s with a breathtaking panorama, lounge bar from the 1960s, 1970s dormitory with a catamaran net, 1980s bathroom and master bedroom offering a breathtaking view of the surrounding mountains. Around the micro-chalet, you can enjoy a multitude of outdoor activities thanks to the hiking and mountain biking trails that start directly from the micro-chalet, allowing you to explore the surrounding mountains and valleys. In winter, you can practice snowshoeing and fatbiking. In the evening, after a busy day, you can relax on the terrace and listen to the calm of the mountain. The Pic is the ideal place for nature lovers and people looking for tranquility in an enchanting setting in the mountains.

The white paneling of the walls invites us to inhale and exhale deeply to release tension and leave it where it belongs: outside the four walls of this haven of peace. Then, our gaze is drawn to the top of the stairs, where a living space flooded with light awaits, thanks to the three almost entirely glazed facades. Upon ascending the stairs, we realize that all elements of the decor are coordinated. The large caramel leather sectional harmonizes with the stools at the island, where 6 people can comfortably sit, and the wood veneer of the kitchen cabinets. â€¢ We love the retro microwave and toaster that add a stylish and nostalgic touch to the overall decor. â€¢ We â€œkifâ€ (as the French say) the projector that unfolds in front of the large window wall, allowing for movie nights with nature as the backdrop. â€¢ Above all, we adore the hot tub on the ground floor terrace, which, thanks to the surrounding trees, allows for relaxation in complete privacy. Mountain bike or fat bike enthusiasts particularly appreciate the secure bike storage and convenient access to several nearby trails. Not to mention the outdoor fireplace area and the indoor gas fireplace that are conducive to creating festive or cozy moments. At le Sous-Bois cabin, thereâ€™s everything to be happy about. description:

CLIFFNO46 Do you know the legend of Cliff? Cliff, a man deeply in love with nature and driven by adventure, roamed the world in search of the perfect place to settle. Despite his relentless searches, he had not yet found it. One day, during an epic expedition on the majestic slopes of MaelstrÃ¶m Mountain, Cliff was captivated by golden rays of light shimmering on tree leaves. Drawn by a mystical force, he followed these gleams until he reached the summit of the mountain. There, before him, unfolded a breathtaking spectacle: the vastness of the horizon. With his gaze fixed between sky and earth, Cliff felt a profound certainty: he had found his haven, his refuge in the heart of nature. Is this legend true? No! But does it not exist a little in each of us? Thatâ€™s why the owners wanted to create a place for the Cliff within us, in search of wonder and the perfect place to pause for a moment. What entices us about Cliff no. 46? â€¢ Its vast belvedere, part of which is covered, allowing one to enjoy the pleasures of being outdoors, rain or shine. â€¢ The wood-burning fireplace, located on the belvedere, which allows one to appreciate the dance of flames blending with the splendors of the panoramic view. â€¢ Its master bedroom upstairs, with its fully glazed wall, giving the illusion of floating above the horizon. â€¢ Its Bike & Sleep experience with its direct access from the belvedere to the mountain biking and hiking trails of Sentiers du Moulin Book your stay at Cliff no. 46, where the beauty of nature meets luxury and comfort.
